profile.bio: Professional software engineer with full-stack experience in distributed systems using C#/.NET, PostgreSQL, and Azure. Passionate about building scalable solutions that optimize performance and reduce costs. Eager to deepen expertise in this ecosystem while also bringing hands-on experience with JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Node.js, and Next.js.

projects.description: Prompt writing and testing on documents with sensitive information.
Another semaphore system to rate lock large amounts of files that needed to delete on age out.
Multiple sites and pages added with dynamic form validation and user friendly UI feedback in an older environment.
From junction tables to complicated JSON structures to multistep CTE queries, I have worked with a lot of SQL.

experience.description: Fullstack developer position that leans backend. I work mainly on two applications: a distributed customer data platform that links customer data across many applications at Reynolds as well as an AI integration hub that brings AI services to our products.

One of only a handful of cohort students hired to become a coding tutor for students who would be entering program. Assisted students with coding challenges, software engineering lessons, as well as helped support other educational staff.

Public school music teacher that taught 6 grade levels, age specific music lessons daily. Students learned how to read, write, and perform on musical instruments. Also led a student choir of over 100 kids as well as a chime group that performed semi-anually for the school and community.
